title: Ticket #5861: knobs with STARTD subsys prefix don't work correctly
description:
There is a bug in the code that does SUBSYS or LOCALNAME prefixed knob lookup that prevents a prefixed knob from being found when there is an unprefixed knob that is a subset of the prefix. The bug was introduced in 8.4.5

For example, given the following config statements. 

config fragment
START = true
STARTD.SETTABLE_ATTRS_ADMINISTRATOR = StartJobs

The STARTD will not see StartJobs as the value of SETTABLE_ATTRS_ADMINISTRATOR because START exists and it the same as the fisrt 5 characters of the prefix STARTD.
